text: Impetuous||Gets extra [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]morale bonus when eager. DON'T USE
All Ranks Fire||All ranks can fire if using a weapon that only allows 1 rank to do so.
[[b]]BERSERK[[/b]]\\n\\n Can go berserk during the battle. This makes them uncontrollable, so they will automatically attack nearby enemies.
[[b]]ENCOURAGE[[/b]]\\n\\n Provides a morale bonus to nearby allies.

Undead||Does not rout, immune to terror, becomes unstable while [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]{{tr:morale}} is low. Suffers [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition while moving through territory not owned by the Undead.
[[b]]IMPETUOUS[[/b]]\\n\\n The unit may decide to attack nearby enemies without orders.
[[b]]HIDE IN GRASS[[/b]]\\n\\n Can hide in long grass.
[[b]]HIDE IN SCRUB AND FOREST[[/b]]\\n\\n Can hide in scrub and forest.
[[b]]FIRE WHILST MOVING[[/b]]\\n\\n Can fire while mounted and moving.
[[b]]STALK[[/b]]\\n\\n Can move whilst hidden in any terrain.
[[b]]IGNORE GROUND TYPE[[/b]]\\n\\n Speed penalties caused by the terrain are ignored by this unit.
[[b]]CHARGE REFLECTION[[/b]]\\n\\n Reflects the charge damage of any attacker back onto them when braced.
[[b]]RESISTANT TO COLD[[/b]]\\n\\n Takes longer to feel fatigued in the snow.
[[b]]CANNOT RUN[[/b]]\\n\\n Cannot run, only moves at walking speed.
[[b]]SCARE[[/b]]\\n\\n Reduces nearby enemy morale. Does not stack.
[[b]]IMMUNE TO TERROR[[/b]]\\n\\n The unit is immune to scare and terror effects.
[[b]]CHARGE NEGATION[[/b]]\\n\\n Negates the charge bonus of the attacker.

[[b]]NIGHT BATTLES[[/b]]\\n\\nAttacking an army at night will diminish their morale and cause fatigue, unless they too are able to fight night battles.\\n\\nArmies without this ability will be unable to reinforce nearby night battles.
[[b]]SCARE HORSES[[/b]]\\n\\n Frightens all nearby enemy horses, reducing their morale.
[[b]]CAMPAIGN STEALTH[[/b]]\\n\\n Moves around the campaign map without being seen.
[[b]]UNBREAKABLE[[/b]]\\n\\n Does not suffer any morale loss and will never rout.
[[b]]CHARGE NEGATION VS. MOUNTED[[/b]]\\n\\n Negates the charge bonus of any mounted attacker.
[[b]]HIDE IN FOREST[[/b]]\\n\\n Can hide in forests.
[[b]]RESISTANT TO HEAT[[/b]]\\n\\n Takes longer to feel fatigued in the desert.
[[b]]RAMPAGE[[/b]]\\n\\n When this unit gets hurt and enemies are nearby, it may go on a rampage, attacking the closest enemy and ignoring any orders you give it.
[[b]]HIDDEN BY ABILITY[[/b]]\\n\\n Hidden by an active ability.
[[b]]FIRE BACKWARDS[[/b]]\\n\\n Can fire in any direction.
[[b]]CHARGE REFLECTION VS. MOUNTED[[/b]]\\n\\n Reflects the charge damage of any mounted attacker back onto them when braced.
[[b]]IMMUNE TO SCARE[[/b]]\\n\\n Immune to scare effects.
[[b]]BERSERK[[/b]]\\n\\n Can go berserk during the battle. This makes them uncontrollable, so they will automatically attack nearby enemies.
[[b]]DISCIPLINED[[/b]]\\n\\n Does not suffer a morale penalty when the general dies. It can also rally after routing more often.
[[b]]TERROR[[/b]]\\n\\n Routs engaged enemy for a short time. It is also immune to terror and scare effects.
[[b]]IGNORE FOREST PENALTIES[[/b]]\\n\\n Ignores penalties caused by forests.
If this unit is able to hide in its current location, it will not be spotted by enemies until they are very close
Hide in Buildings||Can hide in buildings.
[[b]]RESISTANT TO FATIGUE[[/b]]\\n\\n Takes longer to feel fatigued.
[[b]]RUN AMOK[[/b]]\\n\\n Can Run Amok during the battle. This makes them uncontrollable, so they will automatically attack any nearby units.
[[b]]MIGHTY KNOCKBACK[[/b]]\\n\\n Causes extra damage when knocking back enemies.
Formation Attack||Stays in formation while in melee.
[[b]]RAIDER[[/b]]\\n\\n Idle soldiers will burn down nearby buildings.
